text: John Paul Kline, Jr. (born September 6, 1947) is an American politician. He was a member of the United States House of Representatives from from 2003 to 2017. A member of the Republican Party, Kline was the Chairman of the House Committee on Education and the Workforce. ==Other websites== * Congressman John Kline official U.S. House site * John Kline for Congress * * * * Profile at SourceWatch * Campaign 2006: John Kline profile from Minnesota Public Radio Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Minnesota Category:Politicians from Allentown, Pennsylvania Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: John Kline
